divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with 3 neighbors and my son sitting on my patio when all of a sudden a dim light appeared in the sky. It was circular in appearance. It quickly turned super bright white in color.. hovered for a few seconds and moved in a diagonal downward direction for around 2 seconds and then it was gone. It was like it disintegrated or something. My son who is 8 is also a witness including myself. My neighbors were not quick to see the event. It only lasted around 15 seconds. My son and I do not know what this could have been other than it being a UFO. It was definitely not a plane nor fireworks. It made no noise that we heard. It appeared out of nowhere and disappeared into thin air. Did anyone else happen to see this in the area?
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around July 19th 2012
Summary: Round ufo appeared out of nowhere
